front.title: IEEE Standard for Pad-Mounted Dry Vault, Submersible, and Overhead Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems Up to and Including 38 kV
front.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, and construction requirements for pad-mounted, dry vault, submersible, and overhead fault interrupters for alternating current systems up to and including 38 kV are provided in this standard.
